item.title: Daily Routine Scripts
item.description: As I personally tend to move from my office to coffee shops and taking my laptop everywhere, something I personally like to do, especially when outside the office is to run on battery and later on plug to AC later, that said, I switch between Balanced and High Performance plans respectively. Here is a PowerShel Script that uses WMI to list and switch power plans based on a key given, internally using a dict.
